name: Home Invasion: You're not alone
description:
This is a school project done by Nicole Winqvist(Reaperonthego) and Petri Piiroinen(rasitusmurtuma) in three days. Our task was to create a small functional game with "home" as the theme. 

All the assets are done by us expect the sounds which are from https://freesound.org/browse/tags/sound-effects/and https://www.freesoundeffects.com
